title: Identify 'Dream' cursive type? and/or similar
content:
[http://data1.whicdn.com/images/162075969/large.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/data1.whicdn.com/images/162075969/large.jpg)

can anyone identify this face 'Dream' or one similar ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dream_3886.jpg)
author: gazr2d2

comments.content: Can't identify it but still convinced someone will. Some similars now: [Outfitter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/creativemarket.com/gilangpurnamajaya/188096-Outfitter-Script), [Growler](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/creativemarket.com/hustlesupplyco/171944-Growler), [Brasserie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wilton/brasserie)

**Brasserie** mentioned by Ryuk above is an exact match for "ream".  
The |D| is either modified or taken from another font.

Poster design by [Drew Ellis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/dribbble.com/shots/1622359-Get-Back-To-Work). Font/lettering looks like to be also used [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/dribbble.com/shots/1718130-Cotton-Bureau-Tee) and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232914/http:/dribbble.com/shots/1695901-William-E-Henley-Quote-Poster). Try asking...
Thats more than enough, thank you good folk.
